text: Winter break started recently and I decided to revamp my website.1 As I write this, Iâ€™m not even finished with some of the sections, but I wanted to use this as a space to remind myself how to do things in Quarto.

title: ğŸ¬ Initial Commit
text:
Why Quarto?
Quarto is pretty similar to R Markdown, but itâ€™s got elegant cross-referencing, multi-language support, and multiple column integration.2 However, the main caveat with all these features is that I will inevitably forget how to code something, which is why this post exists. If youâ€™re curious, you can click on the </> Code button in the top right to see the source code of the post.
